answers.answer: Did not have GD but was told baby was big. They were wrong.  He was only 6/13 & 30 in.   I was really worried but it all ended up being ok.  Try to relax.  They don't always estimate size correctly.  My DS was 4 days late.  Due date is just a guideline.  It'll happen at the right time.  Good luck momma

My sister in law had an ultrasound around her due date and they told her her baby was already over 9lbs. When she was induced almost a week later, her baby was just barely over 7. They're not always accurate.Also, you may not drop or notice your plug. I never did with any of my pregnancies
I would ask about being induced once youre 38 weeks

I'm hoping they are wrong about how much my baby weighs... Everytime I go to doctors they scare me about the chance of her being still born since she is so big!!! N also, can I still go into labor if I haven't lost mucus plug or dropped???

question: I'm 37 weeks and 1 day ftm. I have not dropped yet or lost my mucus plug... Will I ever??? I want baby to come already cuz they told us she is 8 I lbs already and still growing which puts her at risk for still born.. I have gestational diabetes! Has anyone went thru this???
title: Getting impatient & nervous... I need answers!
